title: DREAM SEAFORT / DOLORES DEI
description: She's crossing the street in the water. Click on her

dialogueTree.title: Dolores Dei: "Dolores Dei -- the innocence of hum..."
dialogueTree.text: Dolores Dei -- the innocence of humanism, internationalism, and the welfare state -- turns around to face you. She has an airship bag in her hand. She seems to be in a hurry.

links.title: Suggestion: "Okay, don't say you need to 'talk'..."
links.text: Okay, don't say you need to 'talk' right away. Melt the ice first -- this way you're *already* talking.

links.title: Volition: "But you don't even *want* to talk t..."
links.text: But you don't even *want* to talk to her! She would only be cold and mean. Let her go.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Let her *go?* This is the holy quee..."
links.text: Let her *go?* This is the holy queen of the territories of Mundi and Insulinde! Think of the historic knowledge we could glean! This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity -- to win her back!

links.title: Logic: "Win her *back*? How does that fit i..."
links.text: Win her *back*? How does that fit in here? And what is the holy suzerain doing here anyway?

links.title: Endurance: "You may not be able to take this. N..."
links.text: You may not be able to take this. Not this time. Not anymore.

links.title: You: "Cinematics KISS"
links.text: Cinematics KISS

links.title: You: ""I know you still love me." (Kiss h..."
links.text: "I know you still love me." (Kiss her.)

links.title: Suggestion: "With your feet trembling from the s..."
links.text: With your feet trembling from the steps you took -- tepid and fearful -- you stand against her; her body close to you, radiating warmth. With your eyes closed you move your lips on her mouth.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She is not kissing you back."
links.text: She is not kissing you back.

links.title: You: "But I succeeded..."
links.text: But I succeeded...

links.title: Suggestion: "This was not about failure or succe..."
links.text: This was not about failure or success. This was always going to be horror. I should not have suggested it, and you should not have listened to me.

links.title: You: "I feel her breath..."
links.text: I feel her breath...

links.title: Dolores Dei: "Her chest rising like a pillow, war..."
links.text: Her chest rising like a pillow, warm exhalations against the side of your mouth -- her tender soul moving through her lungs.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Hidden, distant, kept safe from you..."
links.text: Hidden, distant, kept safe from you.

links.title: You: "Her cheek against mine..."
links.text: Her cheek against mine...

links.title: Dolores Dei: "...feels like soft fuzz, a bird cov..."
links.text: ...feels like soft fuzz, a bird covered in down feathers. Brushing against your broken capillaries.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The world's most precious material,..."
links.text: The world's most precious material, reserved for those she lets close enough to feel it. You are stealing a touch. It's not yours to take.

links.title: You: "Cold silver against my forehead..."
links.text: Cold silver against my forehead...

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The delicate wreath on her forehead..."
links.text: The delicate wreath on her forehead, pressing into your temple. The silver is cold from the spring evening air.

links.title: You: "Squeeze her wrist."
links.text: Squeeze her wrist.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "Her hand does not return the grip...."
links.text: Her hand does not return the grip. Her body is rigid. A current of unease courses through it.

links.title: Interfacing: "Distrust. For you. The curve of her..."
links.text: Distrust. For you. The curve of her spine, her shoulders hunched. She keeps herself stiff, her centre guarded from your motions, unresponsive to your guidance.

links.title: You: "Move your mouth."
links.text: Move your mouth.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "Nothing, just pillows against you...."
links.text: Nothing, just pillows against you. Unresponsive... but for the taste of apricots.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Apricot scented chewing gum."
links.text: Apricot scented chewing gum.

links.title: You: ""You're not... kissing me back." (E..."
links.text: "You're not... kissing me back." (End.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The moment is ending. She is going..."
links.text: The moment is ending. She is going to move her face away from yours...

links.title: Dolores Dei: "...trying hard not to look at you...."
links.text: ...trying hard not to look at you. When she withdrew and you held on to her hand she tried not to look at your face and see the expression there.

links.title: Suggestion: "Brother, you should put me in front..."
links.text: Brother, you should put me in front of a firing squad. I have no words for how I failed you.

links.title: You: ""You didn't kiss me back.""
links.text: "You didn't kiss me back."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She breathes out, heavily, as if so..."
links.text: She breathes out, heavily, as if something painful has passed through her -- and shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""I thought you would... I know you..."
links.text: "I thought you would... I know you still love me. You *can't* not."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She shakes her head one more time...."
links.text: She shakes her head one more time. The evening wind rustles her hair, blowing old newspapers and fast food wrappings down the street...

links.title: You: ""I just needed to do that. I'm sorr..."
links.text: "I just needed to do that. I'm sorry."

links.title: You: "Say nothing, stand there like a use..."
links.text: Say nothing, stand there like a useless dildo.

links.title: You: ""The world should end. Now.""
links.text: "The world should end. Now."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "It does not. It goes on. Children r..."
links.text: It does not. It goes on. Children run in the back alleys. Pigeons take flight. She shakes her head one more time as the evening wind rustles her hair.

links.title: You: ""Why didn't you kiss me back?""
links.text: "Why didn't you kiss me back?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""*Why* did you do that to yourself?..."
links.text: "*Why* did you do that to yourself? You know I don't cheat, Harry. I never cheated on you."

links.title: You: ""*You're* the Apricot Chewing Gum S..."
links.text: "*You're* the Apricot Chewing Gum Scented One."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No..." She just shakes her head on..."
links.text: "No..." She just shakes her head once more. "I'm just Dora."

links.title: You: ""That's it then.""
links.text: "That's it then."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry. Not yet. There is one m..."
links.text: "No, Harry. Not yet. There is one more thing you have to see..." She slides her hands down her chest, and onto her lower stomach. And smiles.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm pregnant.""
links.text: "I'm pregnant."

links.title: You: ""Is it mine?""
links.text: "Is it mine?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Of course not." She looks down at..."
links.text: "Of course not." She looks down at her belly, then up into your old eyes...

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I terminated yours. Don't you reme..."
links.text: "I terminated yours. Don't you remember, you *poor* fuck? Poverty-stricken fuck."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Now, go ahead..." She wipes her pa..."
links.text: "Now, go ahead..." She wipes her palms into the silk of her gown. "...ask me more questions. Let's talk about *something else*."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "No. This has to end. Do the last on..."
links.text: No. This has to end. Do the last one.

links.title: Volition: "More questions. Ask more."
links.text: More questions. Ask more.

links.title: You: ""It's his, the man I heard on the p..."
links.text: "It's his, the man I heard on the phone?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. He did it." She looks down at..."
links.text: "Yes. He did it." She looks down at her belly, then up into your old eyes...

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I terminated yours. Don't you reme..."
links.text: "I terminated yours. Don't you remember, you *poor* fuck? You poverty-stricken fuck."

links.title: You: ""It's not mine.""
links.text: "It's not mine."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Of course not." She looks down at..."
links.text: "Of course not." She looks down at her belly, then up into your old eyes...

links.title: You: "Swallow."
links.text: Swallow.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You know what this means.""
links.text: "You know what this means."

links.title: Suggestion: "Your feet still tremble from the st..."
links.text: Your feet still tremble from the steps you took -- as if over an enormous distance -- standing against her; her body close to you, radiating warmth. With your eyes closed you move your lips on her mouth.

links.title: Suggestion: "With your feet trembling from the s..."
links.text: With your feet trembling from the steps you took -- trepid and fearful -- you stand against her; her body close to you, radiating warmth. With your eyes closed you move your lips on her mouth.

links.title: You: "Cinematics END KISS"
links.text: Cinematics END KISS

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She tried not to look at you -- whe..."
links.text: She tried not to look at you -- when she withdrew and you held on to your hand. She tried not to look at your face and see the expression there.

links.title: You: "Cinematics END"
links.text: Cinematics END

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: You: ""H-hey.""
links.text: "H-hey."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Hey.""
links.text: "Hey."

links.title: You: ""'Hey'? That's all I get?" (Smile.)"
links.text: "'Hey'? That's all I get?" (Smile.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I mean -- hey to you too?" she say..."
links.text: "I mean -- hey to you too?" she says apprehensively.

links.title: You: ""How are you doing?""
links.text: "How are you doing?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm doing really good, actually. B..."
links.text: "I'm doing really good, actually. Both professionally and romantically. I've come to a fulfilling and peaceful period in my life." She nods hastily. "How are you doing, Harry?"

links.title: You: ""I discovered a new species.""
links.text: "I discovered a new species."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Wow -- see? A new species..." She..."
links.text: "Wow -- see? A new species..." She smiles. It's another sad smile, with knitted brows.

links.title: Drama: "She is trying to muster enthusiasm."
links.text: She is trying to muster enthusiasm.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I told you -- good things can stil..."
links.text: "I told you -- good things can still happen."

links.title: You: ""I guess, yeah.""
links.text: "I guess, yeah."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Exactly, now..." She glances over..."
links.text: "Exactly, now..." She glances over her shoulder. You hear distant traffic. An airship passes overhead, dogs bark somewhere.

links.title: You: ""It changes nothing.""
links.text: "It changes nothing."

links.title: You: ""I solved the entire case of the ha..."
links.text: "I solved the entire case of the hanged man."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Wow, see? The entire case..." She..."
links.text: "Wow, see? The entire case..." She smiles. It's another sad smile, with knitted brows.

links.title: You: ""I'm not doing very well.""
links.text: "I'm not doing very well."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Don't say that... I know this *pos..."
links.text: "Don't say that... I know this *positive* thing sounds stupid to you, Harry, but it works. We all have an obligation to be happy. You too. And you *will* be. Now..." She looks over her shoulder...

links.title: Inland Empire: "This is everything I always warned..."
links.text: This is everything I always warned you about.

links.title: You: ""I'm dying. In a ruined flak tower...."
links.text: "I'm dying. In a ruined flak tower. Blood is dripping down my chest..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""God, Harry..." She shakes her head..."
links.text: "God, Harry..." She shakes her head, her eyebrows knitting together with worry.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You have to take care of yourself...."
links.text: "You have to take care of yourself. You're not a young man anymore. If you keep going like this you'll..." She falls silent.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Desperation is gearing up."
links.text: Desperation is gearing up.

links.title: You: ""I'm in my head. I miss you.""
links.text: "I'm in my head. I miss you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Well, I'm in my head too. We're al..."
links.text: "Well, I'm in my head too. We're all in our heads."

links.title: You: ""Do you miss me there?""
links.text: "Do you miss me there?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Sometimes... Not as often as I use..."
links.text: "Sometimes... Not as often as I used to. So much time has passed. More than it seems here..." She stares at her feet -- the zebra stripes on the intersection. The lights of the video rental glow in her hair.

links.title: You: ""Okay. I'll go back into mine then.""
links.text: "Okay. I'll go back into mine then."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She doesn't reply. You're back in y..."
links.text: She doesn't reply. You're back in your head. There's silence.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I shouldn't have bother..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I shouldn't have bothered you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes." She looks over her shoulder..."
links.text: "Yes." She looks over her shoulder again. "I mean no. But I *am* in a hurry."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She breathes out, impatiently."
links.text: She breathes out, impatiently.

links.title: You: ""Something is off.""
links.text: "Something is off."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm sorry. I was heading to the ae..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I was heading to the aerodrome, I just don't have time to..." She stops mid sentence, glances to her right. Then looks at her bag.

links.title: Empathy: "She means she doesn't have time to..."
links.text: She means she doesn't have time to tend to your emotions.

links.title: You: ""You don't have time to tend to my..."
links.text: "You don't have time to tend to my emotions?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She sighs and looks over her should..."
links.text: She sighs and looks over her shoulder.

links.title: Suggestion: "What are you *doing?* Stop saying t..."
links.text: What are you *doing?* Stop saying things like that.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Yes, if you scare her off you will..."
links.text: Yes, if you scare her off you will never *glean* all the historic knowledge...

links.title: You: ""Where are you going?""
links.text: "Where are you going?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm going to Mirova. To live there..."
links.text: "I'm going to Mirova. To live there -- in Graad. It's one million kilometres away, Harry. Might as well be another lifetime."

links.title: You: ""What's in the bag?""
links.text: "What's in the bag?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Just my scepter, my *globe crucigè..."
links.text: "Just my scepter, my *globe crucigère*, a spare silk gown. A toothbrush. Travel documents. The Crown of Immortality."

links.title: You: ""Crown of Immortality? Aren't you a..."
links.text: "Crown of Immortality? Aren't you already wearing one?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, this?" She corrects the wreath..."
links.text: "Oh, this?" She corrects the wreath on her forehead.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""This is just a wreath. The Crown o..."
links.text: "This is just a wreath. The Crown of Immortality is made of rarefied light, manna, and raw palladium. It was passed on to me by the rulers of late antiquity..."

links.title: You: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She looks at the suitcase, not know..."
links.text: She looks at the suitcase, not knowing what more to say, then over her shoulder.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Silence, her nuptial gown flows in..."
links.text: Silence, her nuptial gown flows in the wind, wraps around her holy body...

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Anyway.""
links.text: "Anyway."

links.title: You: ""Your skin is holy and soft.""
links.text: "Your skin is holy and soft."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry." She shakes her head. "..."
links.text: "No, Harry." She shakes her head. "It's just regular skin. I'm not as beautiful as you always thought I was. Let's not get into..."

links.title: You: ""You are. None of the others are as..."
links.text: "You are. None of the others are as beautiful as you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She does not answer. There's that e..."
links.text: She does not answer. There's that expression again.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You have to say *something*."
links.text: You have to say *something*.

links.title: You: ""All the stars burn in absolute sil..."
links.text: "All the stars burn in absolute silence. Have you ever realized?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""The poetry thing is not going to h..."
links.text: "The poetry thing is not going to help. It's only going to make things worse. I *really* have to go... I don't even know how you got here."

links.title: You: "No. It's stupid. No, no, no. No, I..."
links.text: No. It's stupid. No, no, no. No, I don't want to say those STUPID THINGS!

links.title: Conceptualization: "I'm sorry. I'm foam. All I can do i..."
links.text: I'm sorry. I'm foam. All I can do is foam, it's meaningless.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Silence. A distant wind blows. You..."
links.text: Silence. A distant wind blows. You can't think of anything pretty to say.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Let's not. I'm sorry I said t..."
links.text: "Yes. Let's not. I'm sorry I said that."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's okay." She puts no effort int..."
links.text: "It's okay." She puts no effort into making it sound as if it's actually okay.

links.title: You: ""Can you stay for a moment? We need..."
links.text: "Can you stay for a moment? We need to talk. We need to have one more massive, epic showdown."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry." She shakes her head sa..."
links.text: "No, Harry." She shakes her head sadly. "No. I don't want a *massive, epic showdown*. I want to go to the aerodrome. I have tickets for the 10:20 flight to Mirova..." She looks at you plaintively. "Really..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""We don't have anything to talk abo..."
links.text: "We don't have anything to talk about anymore. Every combination of words has been played out. The atoms don't form us anymore: us, our love, our unborn daughters..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's all gone. I have to go to the..."
links.text: "It's all gone. I have to go to the aerodrome. I have to leave Revachol and you. And you have to be alone -- in hell, forever. That's just the way it is."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Oh god, whatever you do, don't try..."
links.text: Oh god, whatever you do, don't try to kiss her yet -- not after that, you're still reeling... you'll fall over if you try it now...

links.title: You: ""But... that's not a very good way..."
links.text: "But... that's not a very good way for things to be."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's not, but..." She looks at her..."
links.text: "It's not, but..." She looks at her feet. Little golden sandals cover her toes.

links.title: You: ""But what? Tell me there's *somethi..."
links.text: "But what? Tell me there's *something* good..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don't know why I said *but*. The..."
links.text: "I don't know why I said *but*. There is no but."

links.title: You: ""That's it?""
links.text: "That's it?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That's it, yes," she looks up from..."
links.text: "That's it, yes," she looks up from her toes. "We've talked about it a million times. You will get over it, just like I did. People do. Things will get good for you again..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Where? In *HELL*?"
links.text: Where? In *HELL*?

links.title: Volition: "Stop, you're only making it worse f..."
links.text: Stop, you're only making it worse for him -- you never help with *anything*.

links.title: You: ""Good for me where? In FUCKING HELL..."
links.text: "Good for me where? In FUCKING HELL?!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Oh yes! She'll come around now. I m..."
links.text: Oh yes! She'll come around now. I made her love you again, Harry.

links.title: Volition: "Are you *stupid*?"
links.text: Are you *stupid*?

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's about to say something. Here..."
links.text: She's about to say something. Here it comes. She's starting to *love* him again.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "Her innocence Dolores Dei fiddles w..."
links.text: Her innocence Dolores Dei fiddles with the handle of her airport bag. She has a *pained* expression on her face. It's agonizing.

links.title: Volition: "See?! She isn't saying anything!"
links.text: See?! She isn't saying anything!

links.title: Rhetoric: "I don't understand. It was... she h..."
links.text: I don't understand. It was... she herself said...

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""We were bad for each other, okay?..."
links.text: "We were bad for each other, okay? I was bad for you. Can you not see, I'm *bad*? I had to stop, I couldn't just turn into a bad person... You *will* get better."

links.title: You: ""I'm not getting over it *at all*!""
links.text: "I'm not getting over it *at all*!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It just takes some time. For you,..."
links.text: "It just takes some time. For you, I think it will take something like... twenty years maybe? It was hard for me too, you know -- I used to think I couldn't live without you..." She looks you straight in the eye -- her irises are light blue, flecked with green.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""But -- I can.""
links.text: "But -- I can."

links.title: Empathy: "She keeps her shoulders squared and..."
links.text: She keeps her shoulders squared and her back straight but it's clear you're still making her sad.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's not. It's just not possible. I..."
links.text: It's not. It's just not possible. It's like *eating rocks*. You just can't *do* it.

links.title: You: ""Twenty years? That's so much time...."
links.text: "Twenty years? That's so much time..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. It only took me one year, may..."
links.text: "Yes. It only took me one year, maybe two." She smiles and wipes her brow in relief: "Whooh."

links.title: You: ""So you felt that way once? That yo..."
links.text: "So you felt that way once? That you cannot live without me?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. But that time is gone now. So..."
links.text: "Yes. But that time is gone now. So *very* gone."

links.title: You: ""With all my strength, I can't. It'..."
links.text: "With all my strength, I can't. It's like eating rocks."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "There is a silence. She looks at yo..."
links.text: There is a silence. She looks at you, then over her shoulder. Then corrects the wreath on the dome of her forehead.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "As you talk it feels like chewing o..."
links.text: As you talk it feels like chewing on gravel, granite, steel bars...

links.title: You: ""Your Innocence Dolores Dei, I'm so..."
links.text: "Your Innocence Dolores Dei, I'm sorry I made you sad."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's okay.""
links.text: "It's okay."

links.title: You: ""It doesn't have to be like this. M..."
links.text: "It doesn't have to be like this. Maybe we could try again?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry, we can't.""
links.text: "No, Harry, we can't."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""We already tried again and it didn..."
links.text: "We already tried again and it didn't work."

links.title: Logic: "Is that how it is now? We should ju..."
links.text: Is that how it is now? We should just try all good things *twice* and then give up? By that logic...

links.title: Volition: "Not you too..."
links.text: Not you too...

links.title: You: ""Let's try building Communism *twic..."
links.text: "Let's try building Communism *twice*. If it doesn't work, let's abandon it and be slaves forever instead?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. Of course. I'm *bourgeois* --..."
links.text: "Yes. Of course. I'm *bourgeois* -- because I don't want to keep hurting you..." She looks away from you.

links.title: You: ""Let's try to return Revachol to th..."
links.text: "Let's try to return Revachol to the likeness of the holy sun in the sky -- but only *twice*. The third time, let's abandon it to debauched homo-sexuals!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. Of course. You're a kingsman..."
links.text: "Yes. Of course. You're a kingsman and I'm a socialist traitor, because I don't want to keep hurting you..." She looks away from you.

links.title: You: ""Let's try inventing the future *tw..."
links.text: "Let's try inventing the future *twice* and if it doesn't work -- abandon it and live on welfare? Is that how we should do *everything*?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Of course, you're a visionary entr..."
links.text: "Of course, you're a visionary entrepreneur, and I'm a *social democrat* -- because I don't want to keep hurting you..." She looks away from you.

links.title: You: ""Let's be the last sane people in t..."
links.text: "Let's be the last sane people in the world -- but only twice. If it doesn't work, let's lose our minds and let it all sink into the pale!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. Of course. You've got everyth..."
links.text: "Yes. Of course. You've got everything under control and I'm hysterical because I don't want to keep hurting you..." She looks away from you.

links.title: You: ""What went wrong when we tried agai..."
links.text: "What went wrong when we tried again? I can do it better." (Proceed.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don't know. Please..." She shuff..."
links.text: "I don't know. Please..." She shuffles from one golden-sandaled foot to the other. In the distance a street car screeches.

links.title: You: ""Why? Why can't we be together?""
links.text: "Why? Why can't we be together?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Harry, we can't be together becaus..."
links.text: "Harry, we can't be together because you're insane." Her eyes turn to sorrowful ovals.

links.title: Empathy: "She avoids turning them to you..."
links.text: She avoids turning them to you...

links.title: You: ""Insane... how?""
links.text: "Insane... how?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: "They're turning moist now, her eyes..."
links.text: They're turning moist now, her eyes. She slowly shakes her head and tries to get a hold of herself, brushing her hands in her gown...

links.title: You: ""Insane -- like what? Like *cool* i..."
links.text: "Insane -- like what? Like *cool* insane?

links.title: You: ""Like: 'Wow, that cop's crazy'?""
links.text: "Like: 'Wow, that cop's crazy'?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not insane. Don't say that.""
links.text: "I'm not insane. Don't say that."

links.title: You: ""I'm the sanest person I know.""
links.text: "I'm the sanest person I know."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Sometimes. You can be very safe, b..."
links.text: "Sometimes. You can be very safe, but..." They're turning moist now. She slowly shakes her head and tries to get a hold of herself, brushing her hands in her gown...

links.title: You: ""Okay. I have *other questions* for..."
links.text: "Okay. I have *other questions* for you now."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I won't ask any more.""
links.text: "Okay, I won't ask any more."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She does not seem relieved at all...."
links.text: She does not seem relieved at all. Glances over her shoulder, then at you... the neon sign of the video rental glows behind her...

links.title: You: ""Okay then. Super okay. I still hav..."
links.text: "Okay then. Super okay. I still have other things I need to know." (Withdraw.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""What *other things*?" She shakes h..."
links.text: "What *other things*?" She shakes her head. "We've been through *all* the things, Harry..."

links.title: You: ""You're right. I don't even remembe..."
links.text: "You're right. I don't even remember who you are anymore! Ha-ha!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See?" Her eyes widen. "It just tak..."
links.text: "See?" Her eyes widen. "It just takes some time. For you, it will take something like... twenty years maybe? It was hard for me too. I used to think I couldn't *live* without you..." She looks you straight in the eye -- her irises are light blue, flecked with green.

links.title: You: ""Maybe. I think I've reached the en..."
links.text: "Maybe. I think I've reached the end of the investigation."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See?" Her eyes widen. "It just tak..."
links.text: "See?" Her eyes widen. "It just takes some time. For you, I think it will take something like... twenty years maybe? It was hard for me too. I used to think I couldn't *live* without you..." She looks you straight in the eye -- her irises are light blue, flecked with green.

links.title: You: ""I have some other questions for yo..."
links.text: "I have some other questions for you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I can't answer your *other questio..."
links.text: "I can't answer your *other questions*, Harry. Not anymore... I have to go."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean by insane?""
links.text: "What do you mean by insane?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You know what I mean...""
links.text: "You know what I mean..."

links.title: You: ""Everyone gets a little down.""
links.text: "Everyone gets a little down."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""A little down? You've worked there..."
links.text: "A little down? You've worked there for so long you can't even talk like a normal person anymore! It's always lists with you. *Questions*."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Questions? Did someone say question..."
links.text: Questions? Did someone say questions?

links.title: You: ""I don't have lists." (Lie.)"
links.text: "I don't have lists." (Lie.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""This is another list, isn't it?""
links.text: "This is another list, isn't it?"

links.title: You: ""No" (Lie.)"
links.text: "No" (Lie.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's not just the lists, or trees,..."
links.text: "It's not just the lists, or trees, or whatever..." She corrects the wreath on her head, with her hands trembling now. "You get sad, Harry. *Too* sad. People can't get that sad. It's impossible to watch..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Other people get sad too, but not..."
links.text: "Other people get sad too, but not like you. You stay down for years, and then you start beating things... You get violent."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""In conclusion -- you're ill. You'r..."
links.text: "In conclusion -- you're ill. You're an old, insane man. And you have to be in hell until the end of your life. And I have to go to Mirova."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Other people get sad too, but not..."
links.text: "Other people get sad too, but not like you, you stay down for too long. Until you start giving your thoughts *names* and talking to things..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Other people get sad too, but not..."
links.text: "Other people get sad too, but not like you, you stay down for too long. You only communicated with *encyclopaedic trivia*... I was so alone."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Other people get sad too, but not..."
links.text: "Other people get sad too, but not like you, you stay down for too long -- and if you're not down, you're up, running around asking questions. Millions of questions..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's not just the lists..." She co..."
links.text: "It's not just the lists..." She corrects the wreath on her head, with her hands trembling now. "You get sad, Harry. *Too* sad. People can't get that sad. It's impossible to watch..."

links.title: You: ""Yes, but it's not possible to talk..."
links.text: "Yes, but it's not possible to talk without lists."

links.title: You: ""Lists are absolutely normal. Every..."
links.text: "Lists are absolutely normal. Everyone has them. You just list everything you want to ask."

links.title: Logic: "In descending order, usually... It'..."
links.text: In descending order, usually... It's best to do them like that.

links.title: You: ""But I like my lists.""
links.text: "But I like my lists."

links.title: You: ""They're not lists. They're *trees*.""
links.text: "They're not lists. They're *trees*."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""This is another one, isn't it? We'..."
links.text: "This is another one, isn't it? We're in a *tree* right now!"

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else.""
links.text: "Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See? *Let's talk about something e..."
links.text: "See? *Let's talk about something else*..." She sighs.

links.title: You: ""In case you haven't noticed, I'm a..."
links.text: "In case you haven't noticed, I'm a cop. It's not easy work."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""A cop... You've worked there for s..."
links.text: "A cop... You've worked there for so long you can't even talk like a normal person anymore! It's always lists with you. *Questions*."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Yes. I *may* know what you..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Yes. I *may* know what you mean."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, you *don't*. You've worked the..."
links.text: "No, you *don't*. You've worked there for so long you can't even talk like a normal person anymore! It's always lists with you. *Questions*."

links.title: You: ""It was just a necktie. It's over a..."
links.text: "It was just a necktie. It's over anyway."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's not about some tie, Harry! Yo..."
links.text: "It's not about some tie, Harry! You've worked there for so long you can't even talk like a normal person anymore! It's always lists with you. *Questions*."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll throw the necktie away!..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll throw the necktie away! It's stopped saying things anyway."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""What do you mean stopped saying th..."
links.text: "What do you mean stopped saying things?"

links.title: You: ""It doesn't say anything anymore. I..."
links.text: "It doesn't say anything anymore. I think there was something I had to do with it. But I didn't. And now it's dead."

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: You: ""I get the feeling you're not reall..."
links.text: "I get the feeling you're not really Dolores Dei."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don't know what you mean, Dolore..."
links.text: "I don't know what you mean, Dolores Dei?" She looks at you quizzically. It does not seem like a mystery she wants to get into.

links.title: You: ""You're... the *ex-something*.""
links.text: "You're... the *ex-something*."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Wasn't I Dolores Dei just a second..."
links.text: "Wasn't I Dolores Dei just a second ago? Now I'm the *ex-thing*... You're confusing me. Look, I have to be at the Lausanne Aerodrome at 10:20 PM. I still have a light rail to catch..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She keeps glancing over her shoulde..."
links.text: She keeps glancing over her shoulder nervously. "I haven't even bought the tickets yet..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "We all told you. *Everyone* warned..."
links.text: We all told you. *Everyone* warned you.

links.title: You: "Who, everyone?"
links.text: Who, everyone?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Everyone."
links.text: Everyone.

links.title: Limbic System: "Literally all of you."
links.text: Literally all of you.

links.title: You: "Shut up, I'm talking to her."
links.text: Shut up, I'm talking to her.

links.title: Inland Empire: "That's the problem. Look at what's..."
links.text: That's the problem. Look at what's pouring out of you...

links.title: You: ""The Ancient Reptilian Brain was ri..."
links.text: "The Ancient Reptilian Brain was right. It was foolish of me to resurface to the loss."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don't know what that *means*..."..."
links.text: "I don't know what that *means*..." She sighs with frustration. "My friends are waiting for me on the platform. I can't let them wait -- it's impolite."

links.title: Authority: "WHAT?!"
links.text: WHAT?!

links.title: You: ""You know what is *impolite?* Consi..."
links.text: "You know what is *impolite?* Consigning a lieutenant detective of the Revachol Citizen's Militia to ETERNAL DAMNATION."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I am impolite with you, Harry, bec..."
links.text: "I am impolite with you, Harry, because you are the past. Me and those friends will have good times, together, in the future..." The evening wind blows in, the gown wraps around her like a white flag. She says:

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""This is how human beings operate.""
links.text: "This is how human beings operate."

links.title: Authority: "I was wrong. You don't have power o..."
links.text: I was wrong. You don't have power over her anymore. You shouldn't have said that. I am wrong about everything. You should go on without me.

links.title: You: ""Cool. Your *friends*. Say hi to yo..."
links.text: "Cool. Your *friends*. Say hi to your friends for me then."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I will," she says. The evening win..."
links.text: "I will," she says. The evening wind blows in and the gown wraps around her like a white flag.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A thousand times, you beaten animal..."
links.text: A thousand times, you beaten animal. A thousand times you've raised that fabric. What is underneath has always calmed you, centred you. Made you sane.

links.title: Conceptualization: "In your mind you could still climb..."
links.text: In your mind you could still climb inside her bed. Still the only man...

links.title: You: ""This is so grotesque.""
links.text: "This is so grotesque."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It is. Useless..." The evening win..."
links.text: "It is. Useless..." The evening wind blows in as she says the words, her gown wraps around her like a white flag.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Just look at her."
links.text: Say nothing. Just look at her.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She does not look back, instead eye..."
links.text: She does not look back, instead eyes her fingernails. They're bitten, frayed. The evening wind blows in, the gown wraps around her like a white flag.

links.title: You: ""I should have stayed down.""
links.text: "I should have stayed down."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She sighs with frustration: "My fri..."
links.text: She sighs with frustration: "My friends are waiting for me on the platform. I can't let them wait -- it's impolite."

links.title: You: ""I should have gone even deeper, to..."
links.text: "I should have gone even deeper, to a place where I never met you. Because it's impossible to meet people in the ABYSS OF THE VOID!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Great," she nods. "It's the abyss..."
links.text: "Great," she nods. "It's the abyss of the void. Soon it will be 'the gloaming'; then it will be the 'world-ending'... My friends are waiting for me on the platform, Harry. It's impolite to..."

links.title: You: ""I'm glad we're having this convers..."
links.text: "I'm glad we're having this conversation. I'm getting so much closure."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm glad too, but I have to go. My..."
links.text: "I'm glad too, but I have to go. My friends are waiting for me on the platform. I can't let them wait -- it's impolite."

links.title: You: ""You're..." (Point to your head.) "..."
links.text: "You're..." (Point to your head.) "The mourning."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""The morning? I don't understand.""
links.text: "The morning? I don't understand."

links.title: You: ""No. I meant *mourning*. I'm grievi..."
links.text: "No. I meant *mourning*. I'm grieving -- but you're not even dead."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh my god, Harry! Stop. I don't wa..."
links.text: "Oh my god, Harry! Stop. I don't want to hear anything about *the mourning*, mourning someone who's still alive -- *any of that*!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I can't do that anymore. I'm not e..."
links.text: "I can't do that anymore. I'm not eighty years old, I'm thirty two. People my age are not supposed to mourn..." She breathes out, it sounds more angry than a sigh.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "This... is a bit *much* for me. It..."
links.text: This... is a bit *much* for me. It feels like your ribs are cracking around your heart.

links.title: You: ""That's so hurtful.""
links.text: "That's so hurtful."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Then why are we doing it?" The adv..."
links.text: "Then why are we doing it?" The advisor to the queen of Suresne sighs and looks down -- at the crumbling asphalt.

links.title: You: ""Good. I think I feel a heart attac..."
links.text: "Good. I think I feel a heart attack coming."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Then why are we doing this?" The a..."
links.text: "Then why are we doing this?" The advisor to the queen of Suresne sighs and looks down -- at the crumbling asphalt.

links.title: You: "Just rub your chest and moan."
links.text: Just rub your chest and moan.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The advisor to the queen of Suresne..."
links.text: The advisor to the queen of Suresne sighs and looks down -- at the crumbling asphalt. There is nothing she can do about your chest pain.

links.title: You: ""It's probably better that you don'..."
links.text: "It's probably better that you don't."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. It really, *really* is better..."
links.text: "Yes. It really, *really* is better that I don't."

links.title: You: ""You're my wife.""
links.text: "You're my wife."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry." She shakes her head."
links.text: "No, Harry." She shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""We were married. You wrote me the..."
links.text: "We were married. You wrote me the letter I threw away..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Not married. We were *engaged* the..."
links.text: "Not married. We were *engaged* then, living in a little house on the outskirts of Central Jamrock, past the lake that formed when a mainline pipe burst in the early Twenties. At the end of a street called..."

links.title: Shivers: "It opens up in front of you, with c..."
links.text: It opens up in front of you, with cracked asphalt, and maple leaves brushing your feet. Halos of street lights hang above you, hunched shadows carry grocery bags home. The lights are on -- in the little match box on the corner.

links.title: You: ""Voyager Road.""
links.text: "Voyager Road."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Voyager Road 21A." She nods sadly...."
links.text: "Voyager Road 21A." She nods sadly. "It was so long ago. It was a million years ago, Harry. No -- a hundred million years ago. I loved you more than you will ever know. I loved you more than anyone has ever loved *anyone*."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""But it is gone now. Nothing came o..."
links.text: "But it is gone now. Nothing came of it. No children, nothing built. We live in the coldest of all possible worlds, Harry, orbiting the most distant star. It is agony, sheer agony..." She shakes her head slowly: "How *bad* I have to go to the aerodrome."

links.title: You: ""Would you fucking stop it with the..."
links.text: "Would you fucking stop it with the aerodrome already!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, Harry. No human being in the h..."
links.text: "No, Harry. No human being in the history of the world has ever had to go to the *aerodrome* as much as I have to go there now. You see..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I have to go there even more than..."
links.text: "I have to go there even more than I used to love you. And *that's* saying something." She looks at her travel bag.

links.title: You: ""I get it. I get it, you have to go..."
links.text: "I get it. I get it, you have to go to the aerodrome!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I really, really, *really* have to..."
links.text: "I really, really, *really* have to go there. No human being in the history of the world has ever had to go to the *aerodrome* as much as I have to go there now. You see, Harry..."

links.title: You: ""I'll let you go there once you ans..."
links.text: "I'll let you go there once you answer *all* my questions."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""The questions will not bring those..."
links.text: "The questions will not bring those times back, Harry." She shakes her head slowly.

links.title: You: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""A street called Voyager Road." She..."
links.text: "A street called Voyager Road." She smiles, sadly. "It was a million years ago, Harry. No -- it was a *hundred million* years ago. We were so, so young then. I loved you more than you will ever know. I loved you more than anyone has ever loved *anyone*."

links.title: You: ""I don't wanna know! Stop.""
links.text: "I don't wanna know! Stop."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It was a hundred million years ago..."
links.text: "It was a hundred million years ago, Harry... No, make it a thousand million years ago. Practically on another planet." She looks at her travel bag, thoughtfully: "Have I told you how bad I need to go to the aerodrome?"

links.title: You: ""But-- I thought if I threw the dam..."
links.text: "But-- I thought if I threw the damned letter away it would help."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It doesn't look like it did, Harry..."
links.text: "It doesn't look like it did, Harry. I'm sorry. I shouldn't have wrote you any letters. I was too young then..."

links.title: You: ""I've heard you before. You're the..."
links.text: "I've heard you before. You're the voice on the phone."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, Harry. You shouldn't have done..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry. You shouldn't have done that..." She shakes her head very slowly, her white hair brushing her shoulders.

links.title: You: ""Do what?""
links.text: "Do what?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Call me like that...""
links.text: "Call me like that..."

links.title: Suggestion: "You ruined it. There was still a ch..."
links.text: You ruined it. There was still a chance. You should have waited longer -- she would have called *you* instead!

links.title: You: ""I know. You would have called me y..."
links.text: "I know. You would have called me yourself, if I just let you. I was too impatient."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, Harry? Do you really think so?..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry? Do you really think so? We haven't talked in *years*... I don't want to call you. I don't want to hear from you. I think of you less and less every year, weeks go by without me remembering you..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Months already. Soon it will be ye..."
links.text: "Months already. Soon it will be years. Every season that passes the lights get less clear. I sit there, in Mirova -- in the holy gratitude of my bliss -- I put my hand on my belly and *smile...*"

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The air gets cold around you. She l..."
links.text: The air gets cold around you. She looks down on her stomach, then up at you. Her eyes are full of tremendous distance and mystery.

links.title: Shivers: "Black-eyed dogs wander the alleys,..."
links.text: Black-eyed dogs wander the alleys, apple trees hang their bony limbs low over the patchwork of roofs: red and black. Revachol West, the evening sun -- she's left and bloomed. Far away from us. Our vast soul.

links.title: You: ""Your name...""
links.text: "Your name..."

links.title: Logic: "Is Dora. That's what the voice said..."
links.text: Is Dora. That's what the voice said on the phone.

links.title: You: "Dora is short for Dolores..."
links.text: Dora is short for Dolores...

links.title: Logic: "...Du Bois, yes. Dora Du Bois."
links.text: ...Du Bois, yes. Dora Du Bois.

links.title: You: ""That's why I think of Dolores Dei...."
links.text: "That's why I think of Dolores Dei..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Why what?""
links.text: "Why what?"

links.title: You: ""Are you Dora Du Bois?""
links.text: "Are you Dora Du Bois?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh no, no-no-no-no." She shakes he..."
links.text: "Oh no, no-no-no-no." She shakes her head. "We're not doing that again."

links.title: Logic: "Yes."
links.text: Yes.

links.title: You: ""Dora, is that you?""
links.text: "Dora, is that you?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes, Harry, it's me." She sighs."
links.text: "Yes, Harry, it's me." She sighs.

links.title: You: "No. It can't be that. She's Dolores..."
links.text: No. It can't be that. She's Dolores Dei, the innocence of humanism.

links.title: Logic: "You're right. I'm useless and borin..."
links.text: You're right. I'm useless and boring. There is nothing I can add to you. You should get someone better to do this with...

links.title: Logic: "Means pain."
links.text: Means pain.

links.title: You: ""You're the symbol of pain.""
links.text: "You're the symbol of pain."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Great. Now I'm the *symbol of pain..."
links.text: "Great. Now I'm the *symbol of pain*." The smile immediately disappears from her face. The air remains just as cold.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "That was not the death blow yet. Yo..."
links.text: That was not the death blow yet. You saved yourself -- for now. Keep stumbling around and it *will* happen.

links.title: You: "I don't want to say that."
links.text: I don't want to say that.

links.title: Logic: "Why? That's what *dolor* means."
links.text: Why? That's what *dolor* means.

links.title: You: "It's Dolores Dei. That's all."
links.text: It's Dolores Dei. That's all.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The mysterious smile on her lips ke..."
links.text: The mysterious smile on her lips keeps stretching wider, as if she's forgotten you're there. In some great and calming thought. Then she notices you -- and it's immediately gone.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The DEATH BLOW is coming."
links.text: The DEATH BLOW is coming.

links.title: You: ""It wasn't me. It was my hand." (Ra..."
links.text: "It wasn't me. It was my hand." (Raise your right hand.) "My fingers called you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""They shouldn't have. They really s..."
links.text: "They shouldn't have. They really shouldn't. I was in Mirova already. Safe. In the warmth of the night. Wrapped in my future love. There, I think of you less and less, whole weeks go by without me remembering you..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Months already. Soon it will be ye..."
links.text: "Months already. Soon it will be years without the hurt. I sit there in Mirova -- in the holy gratitude of my bliss -- I put my hand on my belly and *smile...*

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about SOMETHING ELSE.""
links.text: "Let's talk about SOMETHING ELSE."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""There is nothing else.""
links.text: "There is nothing else."

links.title: You: ""You're just an evil ape. We're all..."
links.text: "You're just an evil ape. We're all just evil apes."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You don't have to hate the world."..."
links.text: "You don't have to hate the world." She looks around her, at the evening light. "Can't you see how kind and beautiful everything is? I don't have time to deal with your pessimism -- there are so many people at the stop at this hour. They're all going to the aerodrome."

links.title: You: ""Beautiful world. Beautiful aerodro..."
links.text: "Beautiful world. Beautiful aerodrome."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See?" She smiles -- as if a weight..."
links.text: "See?" She smiles -- as if a weight is lifted off her shoulders.

links.title: Empathy: "The weight is you and your hate."
links.text: The weight is you and your hate.

links.title: You: ""Evil aerodrome, taking everything..."
links.text: "Evil aerodrome, taking everything away from me."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Don't think like that, Harry..." S..."
links.text: "Don't think like that, Harry..." She smiles.

links.title: Empathy: "She's really sorry she made you thi..."
links.text: She's really sorry she made you think like that about her beloved aerodrome.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""In the aerodrome there are silver-..."
links.text: "In the aerodrome there are silver-rotored ships, and beautiful flying trains I will go away on. It's a nice, peaceful place."

links.title: You: ""Forget about the aerodrome for one..."
links.text: "Forget about the aerodrome for one second... I lost. And it was *you* who I lost to."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It wasn't a fight. I was never fig..."
links.text: "It wasn't a fight. I was never fighting you."

links.title: You: ""It's always a fight with these tin..."
links.text: "It's always a fight with these tiny apes. Someone always loses."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""At first, yes. I *was* angry at yo..."
links.text: "At first, yes. I *was* angry at you. But I truly am *not* anymore. My life is in a very good place..." She glances over her shoulder.

links.title: You: ""You're right, yes. So *paranoid* o..."
links.text: "You're right, yes. So *paranoid* of me. There is no antagonism between us."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You're right. I *was* angry at you..."
links.text: "You're right. I *was* angry at you. But I truly am *not* anymore. My life is in a very good place..." She glances over her shoulder.

links.title: You: ""I didn't want to fight you. You're..."
links.text: "I didn't want to fight you. You're the tiny ape I loved."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She shakes her head. "Let's stop it..."
links.text: She shakes her head. "Let's stop it with the apes, this isn't going anywhere."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You told her you loved her. She has..."
links.text: You told her you loved her. She has to feel *something*.

links.title: You: ""On second thought -- you're Dolore..."
links.text: "On second thought -- you're Dolores Dei, queen regnant of the territories of Mundi and Insulinde -- and nothing else." (Conclude.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes, Harry. I am. Things have gott..."
links.text: "Yes, Harry. I am. Things have gotten *much* better for me -- now that I am the ruler of the known world..." She pulls up the silvery sleeve of her gown, to check the time. "Oh god, it's already so late, I have to *go*, Harry."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A tiny golden watch with red straps..."
links.text: A tiny golden watch with red straps... around her bony little wrist.

links.title: You: ""I have become an unbreakable kings..."
links.text: "I have become an unbreakable kingsman."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Good. That’s... very nice." She do..."
links.text: "Good. That’s... very nice." She doesn’t sound appropriately impressed.

links.title: You: ""You're not impressed?""
links.text: "You're not impressed?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don’t... I don’t know what to sa..."
links.text: "I don’t... I don’t know what to say. I’m tired."

links.title: You: ""You broke me. But I rebuilt myself..."
links.text: "You broke me. But I rebuilt myself. With fascism."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""But Harry, it doesn’t look like yo..."
links.text: "But Harry, it doesn’t look like you rebuilt yourself, it looks like you fell apart without me. I can’t bare to look at it any more, okay? I feel *guilty*. That’s what I feel when I look at you. Please let me go..."

links.title: Endurance: "It’s breaking. You feel fractures a..."
links.text: It’s breaking. You feel fractures across you. Out the cracks comes nothing at all. No king, no man, and no king’s man. The cracks were all there ever was. We are a spiderweb of glass that’s painful to look at. And she’s turning her head.

links.title: You: ""Look at my face. Can you not see h..."
links.text: "Look at my face. Can you not see how *hard* I am?" (Point to your diamond hard fascist face.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Harry, it doesn’t look like you’re..."
links.text: "Harry, it doesn’t look like you’re *hard* at all, it looks like you fell apart without me. I can’t bare to look at it any more, okay? I feel *guilty*. That’s what I feel when I look at you. Please let me go..."

links.title: You: ""There is a way back. To the kingdo..."
links.text: "There is a way back. To the kingdom of beauty. Of *us*. We need to go live in the pale, sweet love. Come, be trapped in amber with me! Forever!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I’m so tired, Harry. I’m so tired..."
links.text: "I’m so tired, Harry. I’m so tired of all this..." She sighs. "Can’t you see, I already *am* trapped in amber with you? We’re stuck here. I can’t do that any more. The aerodrome is the future. It is laughter and ease... I must go."

links.title: Endurance: "You’re breaking. You feel fractures..."
links.text: You’re breaking. You feel fractures run across you. Out the cracks comes anger, and then nothing at all. No king, no man, and no king’s man. The cracks were all there ever was.

links.title: You: ""You're right, it isn't nice. It's..."
links.text: "You're right, it isn't nice. It's shit and I should kill myself."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She doesn’t say anything. It’s excr..."
links.text: She doesn’t say anything. It’s excruciating.

links.title: You: ""I've taken responsibility for my a..."
links.text: "I've taken responsibility for my actions now. I'm a new man. Weighty and normal."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She doesn't know what to say."
links.text: She doesn't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""I'm so fucking normal right now.""
links.text: "I'm so fucking normal right now."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. Okay. I'm glad.""
links.text: "Yes. Okay. I'm glad."

links.title: You: ""I mean: I'm a moralist. The other..."
links.text: "I mean: I'm a moralist. The other moralists almost took me away on their airship! I'm not a broken, insane man who can't live without you. I know I made mistakes. And I've taken *full responsibility* for all of them. So you can live with me again if you want to. I'm better now."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It doesn’t sound like you're bette..."
links.text: "It doesn’t sound like you're better at all, Harry. It doesn’t even sound like you're a moralist, it just sounds like you want to..." She spreads her arms. "*Win me back* or something. I don't want you to try that any more, okay? It's too sad, I need to *go*..."

links.title: Empathy: "Total annihilation. We got annihila..."
links.text: Total annihilation. We got annihilated, Harry. It wasn’t about responsibility at all, it was always only about you having no power at all. Over her. Yourself. Anything. That's why they didn't take you on that airship: you're insane without her.

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm not normal. I'm..."
links.text: "You're right. I'm not normal. I'm shit."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Do you know how much it hurts me t..."
links.text: "Do you know how much it hurts me to hear you say that?" She sounds downright angry. "I'm shit, you made me shit... I can't do this any more. I can't make you *insane* and *shit* any more, I can't let you turn me into a bad person. I have to go..."

links.title: Empathy: "Total annihilation. We got annihila..."
links.text: Total annihilation. We got annihilated, Harry. You never had any power, you never were a moralist -- or anything. You can't even be insane or shit any more. You have to be *nothing*. Nothing without the light and grace of love.

links.title: You: ""I've been reading books. I've got..."
links.text: "I've been reading books. I've got lots of new ideas about ideology and capital."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That sounds nice, Harry, but I rea..."
links.text: "That sounds nice, Harry, but I really don't want to argue about *ideology* with you right now..."

links.title: Empathy: "This won’t be an argument. It will..."
links.text: This won’t be an argument. It will be emotional and true.

links.title: You: ""You don't know what I found! There..."
links.text: "You don't know what I found! There are these beautiful things that can happen. Mysterious -- below matter, even."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""There was a time I would have love..."
links.text: "There was a time I would have loved to hear about them. I would have hung on every word. I would have made you feel smart, just, hopeful. But now is not that time. Now we are in hell and in hell there is only the aerodrome. And boring disagreement."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hear that? That's the sound of mean..."
links.text: Hear that? That's the sound of meaninglessness. Meaning, ideas, theory -- all that has evaporated. Now there is only dry silence -- the sound of a mind made up. Just like four billion others. I am so sorry.

links.title: You: ""Listen, please. It helped me reali..."
links.text: "Listen, please. It helped me realise I can’t let you go *because* loving you is impossible. You're like a star I should follow."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "A long sigh, one millennia in the m..."
links.text: A long sigh, one millennia in the making.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Apricot scented chewing gum brushes..."
links.text: Apricot scented chewing gum brushes your cheek.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm not a star. I'm a confused you..."
links.text: "I'm not a star. I'm a confused young woman, eating your mind. There are no stars. There is no light. There will be no future. There is only this intersection. And the aerodrome. Where I must go, incessantly, brutally -- utterly without redemption or hope."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The star has gone out. She can not..."
links.text: The star has gone out. She can not rekindle it. You can not rekindle it. There is nothing within or below matter, just the dull *no* of a mind made up. Just like four billion others. I am so sorry.

links.title: You: ""Now that I think of it, it's actua..."
links.text: "Now that I think of it, it's actually all just pointless shit and I should kill myself."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She doesn't say anything. It’s excr..."
links.text: She doesn't say anything. It’s excruciating.

links.title: You: ""By the way, I’m making *mad paper*..."
links.text: "By the way, I’m making *mad paper* now. My net worth is insane."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It’s not about *paper*, Harry, or..."
links.text: "It’s not about *paper*, Harry, or anything like that..." She sounds frustrated.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Like she’s heard it before. A milli..."
links.text: Like she’s heard it before. A million times.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It’s about taking care of yourself..."
links.text: "It’s about taking care of yourself. Life is not a competition."

links.title: You: ""Wrong. It *is* a competition. And..."
links.text: "Wrong. It *is* a competition. And I’m going to win."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I can’t do this talk again..." She..."
links.text: "I can’t do this talk again..." She sounds like she’s going to cry -- but not in a good way.

links.title: You: ""You have a new guy, right? He's fu..."
links.text: "You have a new guy, right? He's fucking *poor* compared to me. I'm gonna INCINERATE him. I have more money than any human being should have. It's SCARY how rich I am. I’m richer than GOD!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You're yelling, Harry." She stops...."
links.text: "You're yelling, Harry." She stops. "I can't do this. I can't be *afraid* of your emotions anymore. I can't talk about *mad paper* or any of it. Please just let me go."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You failed. This failed. The hostil..."
links.text: You failed. This failed. The hostile takeover. The dawn raid. Paper made out of broken, twisted trees... You're just insane, insane and gone. Even six billion won't fix you if she’s not there.

links.title: You: ""You're right. It's all fucking shi..."
links.text: "You're right. It's all fucking shit."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, it’s not... I’m glad you’re fi..."
links.text: "No, it’s not... I’m glad you’re finally taking care of yourself financially. I really am, but you need to do it for yourself. Not me. I don’t need it. I need to *run-run-run* to the aerodrome!"

links.title: You: ""I bought you this figurine of a He..."
links.text: "I bought you this figurine of a Headless FALN Rider!" (Give it to her.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I don't want it..." She doesn't ta..."
links.text: "I don't want it..." She doesn't take it. "It looks expensive. I don't want it."

links.title: You: ""I thought you liked figurines. I t..."
links.text: "I thought you liked figurines. I thought the figurines were for getting you back."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That's not what the figurines do,..."
links.text: "That's not what the figurines do, Harry."

links.title: You: ""But then the figurines don't do an..."
links.text: "But then the figurines don't do anything..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She looks at the Headless FALN Ride..."
links.text: She looks at the Headless FALN Rider between your fingers and doesn't know what to say.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The figurines... don't do *anything..."
links.text: The figurines... don't do *anything*? Anything at all? But I thought... the historic figure... she had...

links.title: You: "She liked war games and figurines?"
links.text: She liked war games and figurines?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yes. I thought... it would be good."
links.text: Yes. I thought... it would be good.

links.title: Suggestion: "A form of communication where words..."
links.text: A form of communication where words have failed?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yes."
links.text: Yes.

links.title: Suggestion: "It was a good idea. But she felt ob..."
links.text: It was a good idea. But she felt obliged by the Headless FALN Rider -- to give you things in return. Things she no longer wants to give you. So she refused. That's how it goes -- your figurine rider idea was *naive*.

links.title: You: "Forget it."
links.text: Forget it.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Okay. Sorry. I was naive. Stop list..."
links.text: Okay. Sorry. I was naive. Stop listening to me. Forever.

links.title: You: ""Maybe this revolutionary figurine..."
links.text: "Maybe this revolutionary figurine then?" (Show it to her.) "Maybe you can take this revolutionary figurine? It's got a little musket."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No. Please. Please don't give me a..."
links.text: "No. Please. Please don't give me anything."

links.title: You: ""What about dice? I had some custom..."
links.text: "What about dice? I had some custom dice made in this place...  a Doomed Commercial Area..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Harry, I don't want things. I want..."
links.text: "Harry, I don't want things. I want to go to the aerodrome."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I won't give you things then.""
links.text: "Okay, I won't give you things then."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I didn't *ask* for things. It's to..."
links.text: "I didn't *ask* for things. It's too late to give me anything. I would have liked these things, a long time ago -- the Headless FALN Rider especially..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""... but now, only boring hell rema..."
links.text: "... but now, only boring hell remains." Her crown-of-hair is aglow with the red of the neon on the corner. Like this, she tramples her feet for warmth. It's getting *really* cold outside.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I didn't *ask* for things. It's to..."
links.text: "I didn't *ask* for things. It's too late to give me anything. I would have liked the Headless FALN Rider -- back then..."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Please don't give me any gifts..."..."
links.text: "Please don't give me any gifts..." She looks at the airport bag, then at you.

links.title: You: ""But you said I have a vast soul an..."
links.text: "But you said I have a vast soul and you will always come back to it."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""We both said a lot of things. We w..."
links.text: "We both said a lot of things. We were very young."

links.title: Interfacing: "It was her. I can feel it. I can se..."
links.text: It was her. I can feel it. I can see it in her tender, long fingers. In her wrists... Her hand wrote it. Said those things.

links.title: You: ""Actually, you didn't *say* it. You..."
links.text: "Actually, you didn't *say* it. You *wrote* it in a letter, a handwritten letter. I kept it in my paperwork."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""As *queen regnant* I write a lot o..."
links.text: "As *queen regnant* I write a lot of letters." She brushes a strand of white hair out her eye.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You need to recite it to her. For e..."
links.text: You need to recite it to her. For effect. All of it. No summaries.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Yeah. Put a stake through your hear..."
links.text: Yeah. Put a stake through your heart. She'll get hurt too -- collateral damage.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "She won't get hurt, she'll bend out..."
links.text: She won't get hurt, she'll bend out of the way.

links.title: You: ""I have it right here -- let me ref..."
links.text: "I have it right here -- let me refresh your memory. Let's take a..." (Pause bitterly.) "...trip down memory lane." (Start reciting.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Please, Harry, I just don't have t..."
links.text: "Please, Harry, I just don't have time for this."

links.title: You: "(Take out the letter and read.) "Ev..."
links.text: (Take out the letter and read.) "Every morning, when I step out and you're asleep behind me, I find a LITTLE PIECE OF SADNESS in me. I carry it in my chest down Voyager road."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""...""
You: ""Every step I take, it grows. Until..."
links.text: "Every step I take, it grows. Until by the time I reach the fuel station it has filled me COMPLETELY. I step on the light rail and look back, something-something, bow collector. I know it will be like this -- until I WALK BACK TO YOU..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""...""
You: ""You, you. Every step I take will g..."
links.text: "You, you. Every step I take will get LIGHTER. It almost makes me RUN. Sometimes I do. I can't believe I met you, I can't believe the happiness I feel with you. You have a vast, vast soul and I will always ALWAYS, ALWAYS come back to it."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Okay, stop. Yes," she surrenders...."
links.text: "Okay, stop. Yes," she surrenders. "Are you happy now?"

links.title: You: ""No, I'm not happy.""
links.text: "No, I'm not happy."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She sighs in frustration. "Then why..."
links.text: She sighs in frustration. "Then why are you *doing* this?"

links.title: You: ""There's more: kisses-kisses-kisses.""
links.text: "There's more: kisses-kisses-kisses."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Very well," she sighs. "I wrote it..."
links.text: "Very well," she sighs. "I wrote it. It was morning, you slept. There was hoarfrost on the ground when I left. On Voyager Road. It was autumn, the first autumn. But Harry, please understand -- it was a million years ago. No..."

links.title: You: ""It's a good thing I'm *already* pa..."
links.text: "It's a good thing I'm *already* passed out and bleeding this time. Otherwise I'd pass out *again*."

links.title: You: ""Being a police detective, I have p..."
links.text: "Being a police detective, I have performed a handwriting analysis on this, so I *know* it was you."

links.title: You: ""You know what I mean. You left me..."
links.text: "You know what I mean. You left me a letter saying you will always come back to me. That you can't believe how happy you are with me." (Summarize.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Okay, Harry." She sighs. "Okay. It..."
links.text: "Okay, Harry." She sighs. "Okay. It was morning and you slept. The room smelled of cigarettes and rowans. There was hoarfrost on the ground, when I left. It was autumn, the first one we had together. But you have to understand -- it was a million years ago. No..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""... it was *a hundred million year..."
links.text: "... it was *a hundred million years ago*. I was someone else then -- filled to the brim with love for you. Hanging on your every word. Oh Harry, you were the *coolest*... But I am no longer that person. This..." She points to herself. "... has taken her place. It will devour you. Harry -- I will eat your mind."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The light of the video rental shine..."
links.text: The light of the video rental shines through her dress now. A Dolorian figure, cut in black, moves below. It's still her. Her legs, her breasts, her hips...

links.title: You: ""I was... cool?""
links.text: "I was... cool?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""The coolest..." She closes her eye..."
links.text: "The coolest..." She closes her eyes: "With your leather jacket and your boot cut pants. Smoking in the bus stop. I wanted you to be the rest of my life that day. And you were -- some of it, at least. You were my first. My first kiss, my first time to have sex."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""The first -- and worst -- time I f..."
links.text: "The first -- and worst -- time I fell in love. I will always have that with me. It's a fact. But that is all it is. It's like a ticket stub, Harry. It doesn't *do* anything anymore."

links.title: You: ""A ticket stub...""
links.text: "A ticket stub..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. Let's talk about that too." S..."
links.text: "Yes. Let's talk about that too." She nods. "Let's bring it up -- the zoo. In Le Jardin. The day we went east of the river. To the aquarium first... I was sad about my mother. I don't even know why. The shimmer of the fish tank on my face, the octopuses..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It was just a day then, but to thi..."
links.text: "It was just a day then, but to think! Were we there now, you could touch my hair, kiss me. Talk to me about anything; go..." She shakes her head. "...virtually *anywhere* in the world. Not like now -- now our interactions are limited to *pain and regret*."

links.title: Logic: "That's sharp. And precise."
links.text: That's sharp. And precise.

links.title: You: ""You're so sharp...""
links.text: "You're so sharp..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, it's all you. I always loved y..."
links.text: "No, it's all you. I always loved you for it -- but it could not save us. It could not make me stay. In the end your mind just told you precisely how *bad* things are, and who would want to stay around for that?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You would be right to drown this sh..."
links.text: You would be right to drown this shit in alcohol. Drown it... until your neurons depolarize. Until it's gone, melted.

links.title: You: "No."
links.text: No.

links.title: Logic: "Why? There is still a way to win he..."
links.text: Why? There is still a way to win her back, you know. All you need to do is *analyze*.

links.title: You: ""Can't you turn back to the person..."
links.text: "Can't you turn back to the person you were? Can't you think I'm cool again?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No. You scared it out of me. With..."
links.text: "No. You scared it out of me. With your crying. Your hysteric..." She stops. "The awful time we wound up having. In the cheap rental flats you could afford..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Can't you see -- I can never think..."
links.text: "Can't you see -- I can never think you're cool again. I can only think that way about *new* people."

links.title: Rhetoric: "A cheap rental... with mold on the..."
links.text: A cheap rental... with mold on the walls, and the tap dripping.

links.title: You: ""Cheap flats... So the rich man too..."
links.text: "Cheap flats... So the rich man took you from me."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes. I have found someone. For who..."
links.text: "Yes. I have found someone. For whom I can feel the same -- a copy of my love for you, only this time he is careful and rich. He will not lose me. It will go somewhere. It will grow..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Your heart burns. Through the black..."
links.text: Your heart burns. Through the blackness you feel the treacle of blood on the mattress below you...

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Harry, do you notice how... none o..."
links.text: "Harry, do you notice how... none of this is very *funny*?"

links.title: You: ""No, this is very funny. Ha-ha-ha.""
links.text: "No, this is very funny. Ha-ha-ha."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Stop laughing like that, please. I..."
links.text: "Stop laughing like that, please. It's *scary*."

links.title: You: ""Yes. You are the least funny part..."
links.text: "Yes. You are the least funny part about me."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I hate being that. I don't want to..."
links.text: "I hate being that. I don't want to be anything for you. I hope the decades it takes for you to get over me have already passed."

links.title: You: ""What did you mean by *grow*?""
links.text: "What did you mean by *grow*?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You know what I meant. We're talki..."
links.text: "You know what I meant. We're talking about it again. It came up again. This conversation is about *that* again."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She smiles mysteriously, looking ea..."
links.text: She smiles mysteriously, looking east. Then turns her gaze back to you. The smile is gone.

links.title: You: "It won't help anyway."
links.text: It won't help anyway.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Nothing will. I've been poisoned by..."
links.text: Nothing will. I've been poisoned by newspaper and news. All I can do is scream at them and think of her, secretly.

links.title: Rhetoric: "It wouldn't be a cheap rental this..."
links.text: It wouldn't be a cheap rental this time...

links.title: You: ""I can afford a better place this t..."
links.text: "I can afford a better place this time. We can try again -- this time with money. I can *win* now."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No. It's too late. I found someone..."
links.text: "No. It's too late. I found someone for whom I feel the same love I did for you. Only this time -- he is more careful, he will not lose me. It will go somewhere. It will grow..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're a better man now. With a ran..."
links.text: You're a better man now. With a rank, in a powerful, armed organization.

links.title: You: ""We can get a nice place this time...."
links.text: "We can get a nice place this time. I can provide for you. I was young and weak then."

links.title: Composure: "The you she saw is gone, too. A sma..."
links.text: The you she saw is gone, too. A small stack of sticks stands in its place. Begging.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're a better man now. More level..."
links.text: You're a better man now. More level-headed. More *normal*.

links.title: You: ""Can't you turn back to the person..."
links.text: "Can't you turn back to the person you were? I can see her in you. Under the gown and that wreath.."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""And my Crown of Immortality? No."..."
links.text: "And my Crown of Immortality? No." She shakes her head. "You scared her out of me. With your crying, your..." She stops. "The awful time we wound up having. In the cheap rental flats you could afford..."

links.title: You: ""Voyager Road -- I know that place...."
links.text: "Voyager Road -- I know that place. Where is it?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's here, Harry." She looks aroun..."
links.text: "It's here, Harry." She looks around. "We are *on* Voyager Road. At the end of it -- three hundred metres from the stop. We used to come here to rent videos."

links.title: You: ""The house...""
links.text: "The house..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""There." She points across the wate..."
links.text: "There." She points across the water, into the darkness. "You could not pay the electrical bill. It became a lightless tomb. The years you spent training for the militia, my parents' money... It was not good."

links.title: Volition: "Surely the alcohol didn't help eith..."
links.text: Surely the alcohol didn't help either.
