links.title: You: ""Was I... were *we* drinking?""
links.text: "Was I... were *we* drinking?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She looks at her toenails sticking..."
links.text: She looks at her toenails sticking out from under the gown. "Everyone has a little glass of wine every now and then. I certainly do. It's a *queen regnant* thing. I don't think it was the alcohol -- it was *inevitability*."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "See. If you drank with her, you'd b..."
links.text: See. If you drank with her, you'd be cool again. If you drank with her, you could have sex on alcohol...

links.title: You: "No, that's not it. It's super easy..."
links.text: No, that's not it. It's super easy to quit drinking. And it has no effect on human relations of this kind.

links.title: Volition: "You are right."
links.text: You are right.

links.title: You: ""Where is this Voyager Road?""
links.text: "Where is this Voyager Road?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It's here." She looks around. "We..."
links.text: "It's here." She looks around. "We are *on* Voyager Road. At the end of it -- three hundred metres from the stop. We used to come here to rent videos."

links.title: You: ""There was a bow collector. A light..."
links.text: "There was a bow collector. A light rail. Street car number..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Forty-two," she nods sadly. "That..."
links.text: "Forty-two," she nods sadly. "That is the light rail that took me to Couron, to school and work. Every morning... it's the same stop I met you at, Harry. A hundred thousand million years ago..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No human being should still rememb..."
links.text: "No human being should still remember the position of atoms such... aeons ago. It must feel unnaturally sad -- a sadness so ancient, it is shared even by archaebacteria."

links.title: You: ""What now? What happens now? What i..."
links.text: "What now? What happens now? What is the next thing we talk about?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Is there really anything left? If..."
links.text: "Is there really anything left? If not, we can always repeat one of the things we have already talked about. Talk about it *again*..." She looks over her shoulder. "If you do not to feel like doing that, you should let me go the aerodrome."

links.title: Interfacing: "Don't let her. Don't let her go the..."
links.text: Don't let her. Don't let her go there. You should re-do the topics. Go over *everything*, the things you didn't say before too. Make it go on and on...

links.title: You: ""It doesn't matter anymore.""
links.text: "It doesn't matter anymore."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""We will always have what was." She..."
links.text: "We will always have what was." She leans on her hand luggage and smiles faintly: "I will always be *influenced* by it. But it is over. Now only total, unrelenting hell remains."

links.title: You: ""War criminal!""
links.text: "War criminal!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That is *very* contested by modern..."
links.text: "That is *very* contested by modern historians." She tramples her little feet for warmth and adds: "Very contested. Plus..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You're only saying this because th..."
links.text: "You're only saying this because things didn't work out between us. I have to go to the aerodrome now. I don't have time to defend myself from these accusations."

links.title: Suggestion: "Stop making her angry. She won't st..."
links.text: Stop making her angry. She won't start loving you again if you call her a *mass murderer*. Seriously.

links.title: You: ""Would you say you haven't behaved..."
links.text: "Would you say you haven't behaved like a mass murderer -- with me?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""You were very bad to me too..." Sh..."
links.text: "You were very bad to me too..." She stops. "We've talked about it like seven million times now, I don't want to do that anymore."

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm sorry. You're so..."
links.text: "You're right. I'm sorry. You're soft and good, not a mass murderer."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm not that either... Can't I jus..."
links.text: "I'm not that either... Can't I just *be*?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Who says that? I have ruled with k..."
links.text: "Who says that? I have ruled with kindness, grace and temperance. It's perfectly normal to have an Army of Humanity. I am the innocence of humanism -- I call it whatever I want to."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Besides, you're only saying this b..."
links.text: "Besides, you're only saying this because things didn't work out between us." She stops. "I really have to go to the aerodrome, I don't have time for this."

links.title: Suggestion: "Stop making her angry! She won't st..."
links.text: Stop making her angry! She won't start loving you again if you call her a war criminal. Seriously.

links.title: You: ""Would you say you didn't behave li..."
links.text: "Would you say you didn't behave like a war criminal with me?"

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm sorry. You're so..."
links.text: "You're right. I'm sorry. You're soft and good, not a war criminal."

links.title: You: ""You're not even human.""
links.text: "You're not even human."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "She shakes her head. "I am actually..."
links.text: She shakes her head. "I am actually very ordinary, Harry. Below this gown and wreath I have an ordinary soul and ordinary thoughts. The only thing inhuman about me is this..." She looks around.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""This *thing* you've made me into...."
links.text: "This *thing* you've made me into. I'm sorry for saying so, but I just *hate* it. What is this? This is so far gone, Harry, I don't even..."

links.title: You: ""No, you're special. You had glowin..."
links.text: "No, you're special. You had glowing lungs."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""My lungs do not *glow*, Harry. I a..."
links.text: "My lungs do not *glow*, Harry. I am just like all the others. None of us have glowing lungs -- stop making me into some kind of..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Then it's you. *You* will make her..."
links.text: Then it's you. *You* will make her lungs glow. Your pain is NOT meaningless.

links.title: Conceptualization: "She will -- once you have erected t..."
links.text: She will -- once you have erected the TEMPLE OF LIGHT.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The phasmid queen! Quick!"
links.text: The phasmid queen! Quick!

links.title: You: ""I forgive you that you're pregnant..."
links.text: "I forgive you that you're pregnant. I can deal with it. Just..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, Harry... I don't need you to f..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry... I don't need you to forgive. It's a *good* thing for me." She smiles. "It's good news, why aren't you smiling more?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A warm gust wraps her gown around h..."
links.text: A warm gust wraps her gown around her waist and between her thighs.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "An apricot scented ghost wafts out..."
links.text: An apricot scented ghost wafts out of her -- her skin, the fabric -- into the flow of the air around you.

links.title: Shivers: "All the roads will miss her footste..."
links.text: All the roads will miss her footsteps when she's gone from here.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A completely different world."
links.text: A completely different world.

links.title: You: ""I miss you so much.""
links.text: "I miss you so much."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It will pass..." The gown moves on..."
links.text: "It will pass..." The gown moves on her limbs, like water. "Everything does."

links.title: You: ""I want to go back to the completel..."
links.text: "I want to go back to the completely different world. The see-through world with you."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Please, Harry..." The gown moves o..."
links.text: "Please, Harry..." The gown moves on her limbs, like water. "I don't understand what you're saying. You're pitiful and frightening, a smoky apparition of its former self."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The gown moves on her limbs, like w..."
links.text: The gown moves on her limbs, like water. She breathes out, her breath heavy. You're running out of ideas.

links.title: You: ""Then *I* will make you different...."
links.text: "Then *I* will make you different. I will make your lungs glow. I will make you last *forever*."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, Harry... There is only one way..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry... There is only one way for humans to last forever -- and you did not do that to me..." She shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""I will build you a temple of light..."
links.text: "I will build you a temple of light with my mind. A temple of unimaginable proportions. It will be something no one has ever done before. I will build it with computers."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""An immortal temple of light? That..."
links.text: "An immortal temple of light? That sounds nice. I *do* want someone to do that for me -- who wouldn't? -- but not you. I don't want *anything* from you."

links.title: You: ""I have discovered a new species --..."
links.text: "I have discovered a new species -- I will name it in your honour. The Dolorian Phasmid. It's beautiful like you and also has a white head."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That sounds like it would be in th..."
links.text: "That sounds like it would be in the news... I don't want that, okay?" There's a pause. "Please don't name it that. You discovering a new species changes nothing. If someone else discovered a new species and named it after me, then I would be flattered. But not you."

links.title: You: ""I can still make your lungs glow,..."
links.text: "I can still make your lungs glow, I know I can. If you only let me."

links.title: Dolores Dei: "No answer. The arches of her brows..."
links.text: No answer. The arches of her brows quiver as she looks you in the eye and backs away from you...

links.title: Empathy: "You won't do any of that. You can b..."
links.text: You won't do any of that. You can barely make her cry.

links.title: You: ""You're right. You don't have glowi..."
links.text: "You're right. You don't have glowing lungs. You don't deserve them."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I didn't ask for them either. They..."
links.text: "I didn't ask for them either. They're just a folk tale that has nothing to do with my reign, or the direction I have set our species on..." She glances over her shoulder, then back at you.

links.title: Empathy: "You couldn't make her lungs glow an..."
links.text: You couldn't make her lungs glow anyway, only cry. And maybe not even that anymore.

links.title: You: ""But then this is all meaningless.""
links.text: "But then this is all meaningless."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""It is -- and it's making me late f..."
links.text: "It is -- and it's making me late for my beautiful-beautiful flight to Mirova. Far, far away from you -- and Revachol."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'm not gonna push it. I hav..."
links.text: "Okay, I'm not gonna push it. I have other questions."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Other questions are the last thing..."
links.text: "Other questions are the last thing I need right now..." She cups her ear.  "Hush, can you hear? I think that's the 42..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "It's not. It's not that yet. It's a..."
links.text: It's not. It's not that yet. It's another, you have plenty of time to win her over with *questions* and kisses...

links.title: You: ""What happens now?""
links.text: "What happens now?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Nothing -- I have to go..." Her ha..."
links.text: "Nothing -- I have to go..." Her hand wraps around the handle of the bag in her hand again: "I'm gonna go now..."

links.title: Authority: "You have sworn a holy oath Harry. S..."
links.text: You have sworn a holy oath Harry. She herself begged you to not let her go.

links.title: You: ""Wait, can't we sit down and have a..."
links.text: "Wait, can't we sit down and have a coffee first? There's a cafeteria on the corner..." (Point east.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No. That would only be painful and..."
links.text: "No. That would only be painful and dull. At the aerodrome -- life, love, and laughter are waiting for me. At the cafeteria -- dust, hell, and tragicomedy."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, what is there to do in Mi..."
links.text: "Hold on, what is there to do in Mirova?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Light, life, *culture*... It's so..."
links.text: "Light, life, *culture*... It's so much better than here. Everything here reminds me of you, and the horrible times we had. The nights we stayed up fighting for our dying love."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I have to wipe it all off me -- an..."
links.text: "I have to wipe it all off me -- and be clean again. I want to be a good person again, not this. Not what you made me into."

links.title: You: ""You don't want me to let you go. N..."
links.text: "You don't want me to let you go. Not really. You asked me not to."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""That was someone else. I betrayed..."
links.text: "That was someone else. I betrayed her, overwrote her, and am happier for it. And I'm really going now. The time is up -- I must be on the 10:20 flight..." She turns.

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""Will we ever see each other again?""
links.text: "Will we ever see each other again?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I won't see you but you will see m..."
links.text: "I won't see you but you will see me."

links.title: You: ""How can that be?""
links.text: "How can that be?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, Harry, this is a dream, can't..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry, this is a dream, can't you see? I'm already in Mirova by now. Who knows how long ago this happened?" She looks around. "A year, two, *five* years ago?"

links.title: You: ""How will I see you *again* then?""
links.text: "How will I see you *again* then?"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Right here. Tomorrow night. Once t..."
links.text: "Right here. Tomorrow night. Once this dream starts happening it keeps happening -- three times a week. At least. And Harry, it really, really looks like it's started *happening* again. There's the video rental..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I'm suffocatingly beautiful. And y..."
links.text: "I'm suffocatingly beautiful. And young. And I smell of tutti frutti chewing gum -- like I did that time when I asked you for forgiveness. After leaving you the first time, so long ago..."

links.title: You: ""But this is intolerably bad.""
links.text: "But this is intolerably bad."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""Oh, yes. This is real darkness. It..."
links.text: "Oh, yes. This is real darkness. It's not death, or war, or child molestation. Real darkness has love for a face. The first death is in the heart, Harry."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""See you tomorrow.""
links.text: "See you tomorrow."

links.title: You: ""I like this.""
links.text: "I like this."

links.title: You: ""But I swore I wouldn't let you go...."
links.text: "But I swore I wouldn't let you go. You *told* me -- you asked me to be this way."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I understand." (Nod silently..."
links.text: "Okay, I understand." (Nod silently, like a martyr.)

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No, you don't. You're just being a..."
links.text: "No, you don't. You're just being a martyr. And I'm really going now. The time is up. I must be on the 10:20 flight..." She turns.

links.title: You: ""No, actually, wait! I need to see..."
links.text: "No, actually, wait! I need to see my list again, I'm sorry. Where's my list? Wait!"

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""No. Too late now. You have forgott..."
links.text: "No. Too late now. You have forgotten your list and the time is up. I am really going now. I must be on the 10:20 flight..." She turns.

links.title: Drama: "Lies, sire! She cannot but love you..."
links.text: Lies, sire! She cannot but love you. She  has said so a hundred times.

links.title: You: ""Don't go...""
links.text: "Don't go..."

links.title: Dolores Dei: ""I *have* to, Harry. Really, I've a..."
links.text: "I *have* to, Harry. Really, I've already missed the 8:30..." Her fingers wrap around the bag handle. "I'm gonna go now..."

links.title: Suggestion: "No! Don't say it. Don't beg. It wil..."
links.text: No! Don't say it. Don't beg. It will only make her *go*!

links.title: You: "(It's all I have left.) "Please...""
links.text: (It's all I have left.) "Please..."

links.title: You: "Wait, yes! I have *other questions*..."
links.text: Wait, yes! I have *other questions* first. Where's the list?

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes! Somewhere hidden among the opt..."
links.text: Yes! Somewhere hidden among the options popping up in your nervous system... is the *right* one. That will make her love you again, and not go to the aerodrome at all!

links.title: You: ""Go. Good bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Go. Good bye." [Leave.]

links.title: Dolores Dei: "...is what you want to say. But you..."
links.text: ...is what you want to say. But you don't. Hammers clang in the distance. Children laugh...

links.title: You: "God damn it, everything was fine al..."
links.text: God damn it, everything was fine already...

links.title: Dolores Dei: "The light from the video rental cas..."
links.text: The light from the video rental casts shadows on the ground. She turns her face and it's illuminated by it. Red and cyan...

links.title: Volition: "I can't help you. I am totally usel..."
links.text: I can't help you. I am totally useless. Everything I've said is lies. I want the exact same bad things you want. To stand here, like a pillar of salt, saying...

links.title: You: "I want to go!"
links.text: I want to go!

links.title: Dolores Dei: "Where? There's water all around. Sh..."
links.text: Where? There's water all around. She turns her face and it's illuminated by the sign of the video rental... Red and cyan...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Off to advise the queen of Shest, m..."
links.text: Off to advise the queen of Shest, most likely. This is the holy suzerain of Mundi and Insulinde -- *definitely* not your wife -- you need to talk to her! Think of the historical knowledge you could glean!

links.title: Logic: "I don't know, man... what is the ho..."
links.text: I don't know, man... what is the holy suzerain doing here? Something seems off...

links.title: Volition: "*Very* off. Just let her go. Listen..."
links.text: *Very* off. Just let her go. Listen to me for once...
